verses.verse: וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <WH4941> Now these [are] the judgments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which תָּשִׂ֖ים <WH7760> which thou shalt set לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> before

כִּ֤י <WH3588> If תִקְנֶה֙ <WH7069> If thou buy עֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> servant עִבְרִ֔י <WH5680> an Hebrew שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years יַעֲבֹ֑ד <WH5647> he shall serve וּבַ֨שְּׁבִעִ֔ת <WH7637> and in the seventh יֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> he shall go out לַֽחָפְשִׁ֖י <WH2670> free חִנָּֽם׃ <WH2600> for nothing

אִם־ <WH518> If בְּגַפּ֥וֹ <WH1610> by himself יָבֹ֖א <WH935> If he came in בְּגַפּ֣וֹ <WH1610> by himself יֵצֵ֑א <WH3318> he shall go out אִם־ <WH518> if בַּ֤עַל <WH1167> is the husband אִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> then his wife ה֔וּא <WH1931> he וְיָצְאָ֥ה <WH3318> shall go out אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH802> his wife עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with

אִם־ <WH518> If אֲדֹנָיו֙ <WH113> If his master יִתֶּן־ <WH5414> have given ל֣וֹ אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> him a wife וְיָלְדָה־ <WH3205> and she have born ל֥וֹ בָנִ֖ים <WH1121> him sons א֣וֹ <WH176> or בָנ֑וֹת <WH1323> or daughters הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> the wife וִילָדֶ֗יהָ <WH3206> and her children תִּהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> shall belong לַֽאדֹנֶ֔יהָ <WH113> shall be her master's וְה֖וּא <WH1931> and he יֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> and he shall go out בְגַפּֽוֹ׃ <WH1610> by himself

וְאִם־ <WH518> if אָמֹ֤ר <WH559> shall plainly יֹאמַר֙ <WH559> say הָעֶ֔בֶד <WH5650> And if the servant אָהַ֙בְתִּי֙ <WH157> I love אֶת־ <WH853> אֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> my master אֶת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתִּ֖י <WH802> my wife וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֑י <WH1121> and my children לֹ֥א <WH3808> I will not אֵצֵ֖א <WH3318> I will not go out חָפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH2670> free

וְהִגִּישׁ֤וֹ <WH5066> shall bring אֲדֹנָיו֙ <WH113> Then his master אֶל־ <WH413> to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> him unto the judges וְהִגִּישׁוֹ֙ <WH5066> he shall also bring אֶל־ <WH413> to הַדֶּ֔לֶת <WH1817> him to the door א֖וֹ <WH176> or אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמְּזוּזָ֑ה <WH4201> or unto the door post וְרָצַ֨ע <WH7527> shall bore אֲדֹנָ֤יו <WH113> and his master אֶת־ <WH853> אָזְנוֹ֙ <WH241> his ear בַּמַּרְצֵ֔עַ <WH4836> through with an aul וַעֲבָד֖וֹ <WH5647> and he shall serve לְעֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> him for ever ס

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> If יִמְכֹּ֥ר <WH4376> sell אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> And if a man אֶת־ <WH853> בִּתּ֖וֹ <WH1323> his daughter לְאָמָ֑ה <WH519> to be a maidservant לֹ֥א <WH3808> is not תֵצֵ֖א <WH3318> she shall not go out כְּצֵ֥את <WH3318> do הָעֲבָדִֽים׃ <WH5650> as the menservants

אִם־ <WH518> If רָעָ֞ה <WH7451> is displeasing בְּעֵינֵ֧י <WH5869> the eyes אֲדֹנֶ֛יהָ <WH113> not her master אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who [לֹא כ] (לֹ֥ו <WH3808> not ק) יְעָדָ֖הּ <WH3259> who hath betrothed וְהֶפְדָּ֑הּ <WH6299> her to himself then shall he let her be redeemed לְעַ֥ם <WH5971> nation נָכְרִ֛י <WH5237> her unto a strange לֹא־ <WH3808> does not יִמְשֹׁ֥ל <WH4910> he shall have no power לְמָכְרָ֖הּ <WH4376> to sell בְּבִגְדוֹ־ <WH898> seeing he hath dealt deceitfully בָֽהּ׃

וְאִם־ <WH518> If לִבְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> her unto his son יִֽיעָדֶ֑נָּה <WH3259> And if he have betrothed כְּמִשְׁפַּ֥ט <WH4941> with her after the manner הַבָּנ֖וֹת <WH1323> of daughters יַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> he shall deal לָּֽהּ׃

אִם־ <WH518> If אַחֶ֖רֶת <WH312> him another יִֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> If he take ל֑וֹ שְׁאֵרָ֛הּ <WH7607> [wife] her food כְּסוּתָ֥הּ <WH3682> her raiment וְעֹנָתָ֖הּ <WH5772> and her duty of marriage לֹ֥א <WH3808> may not יִגְרָֽע׃ <WH1639> shall he not diminish

וְאִם־ <WH518> If שְׁלָ֨שׁ־ <WH7969> not these three אֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these לֹ֥א <WH3808> he will not יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> And if he do לָ֑הּ וְיָצְאָ֥ה <WH3318> unto her then shall she go out חִנָּ֖ם <WH2600> free אֵ֥ין <WH369> without כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> without money ס
מַכֵּ֥ה <WH5221> He that smiteth אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> a man וָמֵ֖ת <WH4191> so that he die מ֥וֹת <WH4191> shall be surely יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> put to death

וַאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> if לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not צָדָ֔ה <WH6658> And if a man lie not in wait וְהָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> but God אִנָּ֣ה <WH579> deliver לְיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> [him] into his hand וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <WH7760> then I will appoint לְךָ֙ מָק֔וֹם <WH4725> thee a place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> to which יָנ֖וּס <WH5127> whither he shall flee שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> in it ס

וְכִי־ <WH3588> If יָזִ֥ד <WH2102> come presumptuously אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> But if a man עַל־ <WH5921> toward רֵעֵ֖הוּ <WH7453> upon his neighbour לְהָרְג֣וֹ <WH2026> to slay בְעָרְמָ֑ה <WH6195> him with guile מֵעִ֣ם <WH5973> him from מִזְבְּחִ֔י <WH4196> him from mine altar תִּקָּחֶ֖נּוּ <WH3947> thou shalt take לָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> that he may die ס
וּמַכֵּ֥ה <WH5221> And he that smiteth אָבִ֛יו <WH1> his father וְאִמּ֖וֹ <WH517> or his mother מ֥וֹת <WH4191> shall be surely יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> put to death

וְגֹנֵ֨ב <WH1589> And he that stealeth אִ֧ישׁ <WH376> a man וּמְכָר֛וֹ <WH4376> and selleth וְנִמְצָ֥א <WH4672> him or if he be found בְיָד֖וֹ <WH3027> in his hand מ֥וֹת <WH4191> he shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> be put to death ס
וּמְקַלֵּ֥ל <WH7043> And he that curseth אָבִ֛יו <WH1> his father וְאִמּ֖וֹ <WH517> or his mother מ֥וֹת <WH4191> shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> be put to death ס

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> If יְרִיבֻ֣ן <WH7378> strive אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> together and one וְהִכָּה־ <WH5221> smite אִישׁ֙ <WH376> and one אֶת־ <WH853> רֵעֵ֔הוּ <WH7453> another בְּאֶ֖בֶן <WH68> with a stone א֣וֹ <WH176> or בְאֶגְרֹ֑ף <WH106> with [his] fist וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> does not יָמ֖וּת <WH4191> and he die וְנָפַ֥ל <WH5307> not but keepeth לְמִשְׁכָּֽב׃ <WH4904> [his] bed

אִם־ <WH518> if יָק֞וּם <WH6965> If he rise again וְהִתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <WH1980> and walk בַּח֛וּץ <WH2351> abroad עַל־ <WH5921> on מִשְׁעַנְתּ֖וֹ <WH4938> upon his staff וְנִקָּ֣ה <WH5352> [him] be quit הַמַּכֶּ֑ה <WH5221> then shall he that smote רַ֥ק <WH7535> but שִׁבְתּ֛וֹ <WH7674> [for] the loss of his time יִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> only he shall pay וְרַפֹּ֥א <WH7495> and shall cause [him] to be thoroughly יְרַפֵּֽא׃ <WH7495> healed ס

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> If יַכֶּה֩ <WH5221> smite אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> And if a man אֶת־ <WH853> עַבְדּ֜וֹ <WH5650> his servant א֤וֹ <WH176> or אֶת־ <WH853> אֲמָתוֹ֙ <WH519> or his maid בַּשֵּׁ֔בֶט <WH7626> with a rod וּמֵ֖ת <WH4191> and he die תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> under his hand נָקֹ֖ם <WH5358> he shall be surely יִנָּקֵֽם׃ <WH5358> punished

אַ֥ךְ <WH389> Notwithstanding אִם־ <WH518> If י֛וֹם <WH3117> a day א֥וֹ <WH176> or יוֹמַ֖יִם <WH3117> A day יַעֲמֹ֑ד <WH5975> if he continue לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יֻקַּ֔ם <WH5358> he shall not be punished כִּ֥י <WH3588> for כַסְפּ֖וֹ <WH3701> for he [is] his money הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he ס

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> If יִנָּצ֣וּ <WH5327> strive אֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH582> If men וְנָ֨גְפ֜וּ <WH5062> and hurt אִשָּׁ֤ה <WH802> a woman הָרָה֙ <WH2030> with child וְיָצְא֣וּ <WH3318> depart יְלָדֶ֔יהָ <WH3206> so that her fruit וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> is no יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become אָס֑וֹן <WH611> [from her] and yet no mischief follow עָנ֣וֹשׁ <WH6064> he shall be surely יֵעָנֵ֗שׁ <WH6064> punished כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יָשִׁ֤ית <WH7896> will lay עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and בַּ֣עַל <WH1167> husband הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> according as the woman's וְנָתַ֖ן <WH5414> upon him and he shall pay בִּפְלִלִֽים׃ <WH6414> as the judges

וְאִם־ <WH518> if אָס֖וֹן <WH611> And if [any] mischief follow יִהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> become וְנָתַתָּ֥ה <WH5414> then thou shalt give נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> life תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Thahash נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <WH5315> for life

עַ֚יִן <WH5869> Eye תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash עַ֔יִן <WH5869> for eye שֵׁ֖ן <WH8127> tooth תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash שֵׁ֑ן <WH8127> for tooth יָ֚ד <WH3027> hand תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash יָ֔ד <WH3027> for hand רֶ֖גֶל <WH7272> foot תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Thahash רָֽגֶל׃ <WH7272> for foot

כְּוִיָּה֙ <WH3555> Burning תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash כְּוִיָּ֔ה <WH3555> for burning פֶּ֖צַע <WH6482> wound תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash פָּ֑צַע <WH6482> for wound חַבּוּרָ֕ה <WH2250> stripe תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> Thahash חַבּוּרָֽה׃ <WH2250> for stripe ס

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> If יַכֶּ֨ה <WH5221> smite אִ֜ישׁ <WH376> And if a man אֶת־ <WH853> עֵ֥ין <WH5869> the eye עַבְדּ֛וֹ <WH5650> of his servant אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or אֶת־ <WH853> עֵ֥ין <WH5869> or the eye אֲמָת֖וֹ <WH519> of his maid וְשִֽׁחֲתָ֑הּ <WH7843> that it perish לַֽחָפְשִׁ֥י <WH2670> free יְשַׁלְּחֶ֖נּוּ <WH7971> he shall let him go תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> for עֵינֽוֹ׃ <WH5869> his eye's ס

וְאִם־ <WH518> and if שֵׁ֥ן <WH8127> tooth עַבְדּ֛וֹ <WH5650> out his manservant's אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or שֵׁ֥ן <WH8127> tooth אֲמָת֖וֹ <WH519> or his maidservant's יַפִּ֑יל <WH5307> And if he smite לַֽחָפְשִׁ֥י <WH2670> free יְשַׁלְּחֶ֖נּוּ <WH7971> he shall let him go תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> account שִׁנּֽוֹ׃ <WH8127> for his tooth's פ

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> If יִגַּ֨ח <WH5055> gore שׁ֥וֹר <WH7794> If an ox אֶת־ <WH853> אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> a man א֥וֹ <WH176> or אֶת־ <WH853> אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> or a woman וָמֵ֑ת <WH4191> that they die סָק֨וֹל <WH5619> shall be surely יִסָּקֵ֜ל <WH5619> stoned הַשּׁ֗וֹר <WH7794> then the ox וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not יֵאָכֵל֙ <WH398> shall not be eaten אֶת־ <WH853> בְּשָׂר֔וֹ <WH1320> and his flesh וּבַ֥עַל <WH1167> but the owner הַשּׁ֖וֹר <WH7794> of the ox נָקִֽי׃ <WH5355> [shall be] quit

וְאִ֡ם <WH518> If שׁוֹר֩ <WH7794> But if the ox נַגָּ֨ח <WH5056> were wont to push with his horn ה֜וּא <WH1931> he מִתְּמֹ֣ל <WH8543> before שִׁלְשֹׁ֗ם <WH8032> before that time וְהוּעַ֤ד <WH5749> and it hath been testified בִּבְעָלָיו֙ <WH1167> to his owner וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יִשְׁמְרֶ֔נּוּ <WH8104> and he hath not kept וְהֵמִ֥ית <WH4191> him in but that he hath killed אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> a man א֣וֹ <WH176> or אִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> or a woman הַשּׁוֹר֙ <WH7794> the ox יִסָּקֵ֔ל <WH5619> shall be stoned וְגַם־ <WH1571> also בְּעָלָ֖יו <WH1167> and his owner יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> also shall be put to death

אִם־ <WH518> If כֹּ֖פֶר <WH3724> on him a sum of money יוּשַׁ֣ת <WH7896> If there be laid עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> of וְנָתַן֙ <WH5414> then he shall give פִּדְיֹ֣ן <WH6306> for the ransom נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <WH5315> of his life כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יוּשַׁ֖ת <WH7896> whatsoever is laid עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

אוֹ־ <WH176> or בֵ֥ן <WH1121> a son יִגָּ֖ח <WH5055> Whether he have gored אוֹ־ <WH176> or בַ֣ת <WH1323> a daughter יִגָּ֑ח <WH5055> have gored כַּמִּשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> according to this judgment הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> to the same יֵעָ֥שֶׂה <WH6213> shall it be done לּֽוֹ׃

אִם־ <WH518> If עֶ֛בֶד <WH5650> a manservant יִגַּ֥ח <WH5055> shall push הַשּׁ֖וֹר <WH7794> If the ox א֣וֹ <WH176> or אָמָ֑ה <WH519> or a maidservant כֶּ֣סֶף ׀ <WH3701> of silver שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> thirty שְׁקָלִ֗ים <WH8255> shekels יִתֵּן֙ <WH5414> he shall give לַֽאדֹנָ֔יו <WH113> unto their master וְהַשּׁ֖וֹר <WH7794> and the ox יִסָּקֵֽל׃ <WH5619> shall be stoned ס

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> If יִפְתַּ֨ח <WH6605> shall open אִ֜ישׁ <WH376> And if a man בּ֗וֹר <WH953> a pit א֠וֹ <WH176> or כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יִכְרֶ֥ה <WH3738> shall dig אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> or if a man בֹּ֖ר <WH953> a pit וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and does not יְכַסֶּ֑נּוּ <WH3680> and not cover וְנָֽפַל־ <WH5307> fall שָׁ֥מָּה <WH8033> over שּׁ֖וֹר <WH7794> it and an ox א֥וֹ <WH176> or חֲמֽוֹר׃ <WH2543> or an ass
